ygData.subject: Re: (no subject)
ygData.msgSnippet: ... From: Gary The Q  As for the view, I usually use the first person view (al Quake). I don t play Quake though. I would get motion
ygData.messageBody:
----- Original Message -----
From: Gary The Q <kanglun@...>
As for the view, I usually use the first person view (al Quake). I don't
play Quake though. I would get motion sickness in 5mins. Anyway, I do use
the other view type, the top down view. There are bonus to hit and damage
if u attack from behind (at least that's what I heard from a player. And I
do find that I hit more often and damage higher sometimes).

>The good thing about using the ass-cam etc is so you can look behind you
and around to spot oncoming monsters <gnolls are good are creeping from the
back and if I see Fippy/Garrax Darkpaw, I'm gonna kick them real hard!>.

No idea on this one. I'm a Monk. I'm my weapon and armor itself.

>My sentiments exactly! Welcome Brother!


One hour in real life is like 1 whole day in EverQuest <morning til night>
>Yeah, and I hate that. You can hardly see at nite if u're human or don't
have any lightsource with u.

>For those unlucky shumacks humans without infravision or the other "talent"
go buy a large lantern at 2gp++ to save banging your head in the walls when
walking. BTW, banging your head on the wall for 1 hour takes up 150
calories.

Well, generating 3ds are quite space and memory consuming...

>Never thought of that. Stupid me!

>Marcoing is still present but MUCH MUCH SO MUCH MUCH SO MUCH more less
effective.
>> Aye, actually what marcoing?? That game u bascially use hotkeys to play
the game. And better brush up on the typing skills. U'll want to type very
fast in certain situation. Heheh.

>>>Marcoing the continous pressing/meshing of the same button to train a
certain skill. Eg, I sit and keep pressing the Sense Heading keys while
watching Friends.

>If your Lawyer or your Boss is drowning, would you choose going to the
movies or to StarBucks? <drafted>
>> If Starwars in being screen then, it's Starwars!!!

>>>Right on Dude!!!
